name: Sentinel SDK
description: Registers Sentinel memory and reliability tools for OpenClaw agents.
author: OpenClaw Sentinel <support@openclawsentinel.com>

apiKey.description: Sentinel API key generated by openclawsentinel.com

baseUrl.description: Sentinel API base URL. Defaults to https://api.openclawsentinel.com

agentId.description: Agent identifier used for memory and backup records
